subject: Baseball
Little League World Series
lead_paragraph: Nicholas Smisek’s grand slam and Steven Cardone’s three-run homer were part of a 12-run third inning for San Antonio in a game halted because of the 10-run rule.
snippet: Nicholas Smisek’s grand slam and Steven Cardone’s three-run homer were part of a 12-run third inning for San Antonio in a game halted because of the 10-run rule.
